rocks.bastion.core.builder

Interface BastionBuilder<MODEL>

  • Type Parameters:
    MODEL - The model type which was bound with the BindBuilder.bind(Class) method.
    All Superinterfaces:
    AssertionsBuilder<MODEL>, BindBuilder, CallbackBuilder<MODEL>, ExecuteRequestBuilder<MODEL>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BastionBuilderImpl

    public interface BastionBuilder<MODEL>
extends BindBuilder, AssertionsBuilder<MODEL>
    The first interface for the Bastion fluent-builder allowing the user to bind a model type, apply assertions, apply a callback function and initiate the test. This interface serves to group together all the options for Bastion users immediately after invoking the Bastion builder using Bastion.request(String, HttpRequest). Using this builder, a user can:
    • BindBuilder.bind(Class): Specify which class type to use when constructing a model of the received response. Bastion will interpret and decode the received response object into an instance of whatever type is supplied to this method.
    • AssertionsBuilder.withAssertions(Assertions): Specify what test assertions to apply to the response. We recommend supplying the assertions as a lambda or using one of the available subclass implementations of Assertions.
    • CallbackBuilder.thenDo(Callback): Specify a callback function to execute when the response is received and it passes its assertions. We recommend supplying the Callback as a lambda function.
    • ExecuteRequestBuilder.call(): Starts the Bastion test by executing the HTTP request.
    After using the ExecuteRequestBuilder.call() method, the user may obtain the response, for further use in the ongoing test, using methods defined in the PostExecutionBuilder interface.
    Note that the user must perform the steps detailed above, in the order they are listed: the user may skip any of the steps but they cannot perform steps out of order (for example, if you supply a callback function using CallbackBuilder.thenDo(Callback) then you cannot use the BindBuilder.bind(Class) method afterwards.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface rocks.bastion.core.builder.BindBuilder

      • Methods inherited from interface rocks.bastion.core.builder.AssertionsBuilder

      • Methods inherited from interface rocks.bastion.core.builder.CallbackBuilder

      • Methods inherited from interface rocks.bastion.core.builder.ExecuteRequestBuilder
